    • Method Detail

      • onActionSaveAppt

        public void onActionSaveAppt​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
        Event handler to Appointment Menu. Calls methods to verify values. Saves data and updates database. See Nav.toAppointmentsMenu.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - ActionEvent instantiated via event handler tied to button.

      • onActionCancel

        public void onActionCancel​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
        Event handler to Appointment Menu. Discards any changes, makes no changes to database. See Nav.toAppointmentsMenu.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - ActionEvent instantiated via event handler tied to button.

      • checkStartBeforeEnd

        public boolean checkStartBeforeEnd​(java.sql.Timestamp startRequest,
                                   java.sql.Timestamp endRequest)
        Verifies user did not request a start to come after an end.
        Parameters:
        startRequest - Timestamp created by startDate and startTime
        endRequest - Timestamp created by endDate and endTime
        Returns:
        boolean true if start before end

      • checkApptNotInPast

        public boolean checkApptNotInPast​(java.sql.Timestamp startRequest)
        Verifies user did not request an appointment in the past.
        Parameters:
        startRequest - date and time timestamp of appointment start
        Returns:
        boolean, true if not in past

      • checkOverlap

        public boolean checkOverlap​(java.sql.Timestamp startRequest,
                            java.sql.Timestamp endRequest,
                            int customerID,
                            int appointmentID)
        Verifies no overlap of previously scheduled appointments of the customer. Prevents checking of the same appointmentID in case of no appointment Timestamp modification.
        Parameters:
        startRequest - date and time timestamp of appointment start
        endRequest - date and time timestamp of appointment end
        customerID - customer to have appointment with
        appointmentID - appointment ID
        Returns:
        boolean true if no appointment timestamp overlap exists

      • checkBlanks

        public boolean checkBlanks​(java.lang.String title,
                           java.lang.String description,
                           java.lang.String location,
                           java.lang.String type,
                           int cusID,
                           java.lang.String contact)
        Verifies users submitted data into all fields.
        Parameters:
        title - title field submitted
        description - description field submitted
        location - location field submitted
        type - type field submitted
        cusID - customer field submitted
        contact - contact field submitted
        Returns:
        boolean true if all fields filled

      • initialize

        public void initialize​(java.net.URL url,
                       java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
        Initial method called upon screen load. Sets values into appropriate combo boxes.
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
